customer_name: The Old Red Schoolhouse Wildlife Center
site_name: THE OLD RED SCHOOLHOUSE WILDLIFE CENTER

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 - 11:30
a.m. on 06-APR-17.
Knocked on the door and no one answered. The telephone number on file was called multiple times and messages
were left. Waited an hour. No one came.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 - 11:30
a.m.  on 06-APR-17.
Knocked on the door and no one answered.  The telephone number on file was called multiple times and messages
were left.  Waited an hour.  No one came.
